name: DeathScroll
description:
There was a sorcerer with a great ambitions  And with her everything began!

you play as M a history student specialized in Egyptian history you found a creepy looking sacred tablet you investigate about it and your research led you to mysterious adventure!

Hope You all like it >.<

Made for the GameDev.tv game jam 2022 in 3 days cuz i like stress yes ~
